name: unix-timestamp-converter
title: Unix Timestamp Converter
description: Convert Unix timestamps to readable date and time formats for any country or timezone, or generate Unix timestamps from human-readable dates. Supports multiple time zones and display formats.
author: ride-space

commands.name: convert-timestamp
commands.title: Convert Timestamp
commands.subtitle: Unix Time Converter
commands.description: Convert Unix timestamps to human-readable date and time formats for any timezone. Simply enter a Unix timestamp to see it converted to your preferred regional format.

commands.name: generate-timestamp
commands.title: Generate Timestamp
commands.subtitle: Unix Time Generator
commands.description: Create Unix timestamps from human-readable dates and times. Enter a date in your preferred format to convert it to Unix time.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
